channel.title: Prog Commands Need Help!

item.title: Prog Commands Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @billysmither billysmither
item.description:
@billysmither wrote:

[code]
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“2bil”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(0995, 2000000000);

                      }[/code]

you will get a error with this anyway in any source


else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("2bil") && playerRights >= 2)
         {
                 addItem(995, 2000000000);
              
                          }

Now that you wont but on project 16 its coded all different

Read full topic

if your using other people commands make sure they are tested on project 16 first

item.title: Prog Commands Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @000000s 000000s
item.description:
@000000s wrote:

Ok, Im using P16 v6 for my server, and the commands on the server are… well… total bullshit

BUT when I try to program other commands in… FOLLOWING THE GUIDES PEOPLE POST FOR ME TO FOLO… They never work… Then when I open my “Start Server” it shows there was an error in the commands I put in… And I was using simple prog like this…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“2bil”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(0995, 2000000000);

    						}

Witch should be right… Well I was using better commands…

Can anyone help?

000000s, Suprieme Overlord of Java Nubs

Read full topic
